pos_mean_info_list.mean: 保持器；家臣；保持者；[机] 护圈；预付费用

word_mean_info__list.difference: 一般指保存自然资源，保全人的精力、力量等。
正式用词，指为了将来的用途或其他用途而保存、保留。
指扣住不放，暗示有阻碍。
主要指为防止损害、变质等而保存。
最常用词，指长时间牢固地保持或保存。

bilingual.source: Drink plenty of water to retain hydration.
This type of soil inclines to retain moisture.
bilingual.target: 这种土壤倾向于保持水分。

bilingual.source: She managed to retain her composure during the interview.
bilingual.target: 她在面试中设法保持了镇静。

bilingual.source: The gardener mulched the flower beds to retain moisture.
bilingual.target: 园丁给花坛覆盖上覆盖物以保持水分。

bilingual.source: An occlusive moisturizer can help to retain skin moisture.
bilingual.target: 封闭的保湿霜可以帮助保持皮肤水分。

bilingual.source: Before freezing the beans, blanch them to retain their texture.
bilingual.target: 在冷冻豆子之前，先焯一下以保持其口感。

bilingual.source: The garden soil is rich in clay, which helps retain moisture.
bilingual.target: 花园的土壤富含黏土，有助于保持水分。

bilingual.source: Apply mulch around the base of the plants to retain moisture.
bilingual.target: 在植物根部周围铺上覆盖物以保持水分。

bilingual.source: The gardener decided to barden the flower beds to retain moisture.
bilingual.target: 园丁决定用树皮覆盖花坛以保持水分。

bilingual.source: The immortelle is known for its ability to retain its color even when dried.
bilingual.target: 蜡菊以其在干燥后仍能保持颜色的能力而闻名。

list.abstract: retain，英语动词，意思是保留，保持，留在心中，记住；雇用；付定金保留。

yingyinNormal.en: Is that fair? It's always been a huge plus that we have our own hospital and he wants to retain it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这公平吗？我们有自己的医院一向是好事，他想保持现状。

yingyinNormal.en: I am nothing but sincere. You set out to undermine the council and retain the chancellorate. Fang Zhen fell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真诚的很，你打算破坏枢密院因此来保留相位，方真失败了。

yingyinNormal.en: A regime that would target hospitals, refugee camps, schools or bread lines in order to retain power must be confronted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个悍然攻击医院，难民营，学校和救济车队只为了自保的政权必须予以惩罚。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: continue to have something; keep possession of

examination_example.sentence: Each spouse <highlight>retains</highlight> whatever property he or she brought into the marriage, and jointly-acquired property is divided equally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 配偶双方保留他或她带入婚姻的任何财产，共同获得的财产平分。

examination_example.sentence: Half a century of town and country planning has enabled it to <highlight>retain</highlight> an enviable rural coherence, while still permitting low-density urban living.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 五十年的城乡发展计划使它能够保持令人羡慕的乡村和谐，与此同时还能确保低密度的城市生活。

examination_example.sentence: The Labour party has recently announced that it will <highlight>retain</highlight> a large part of the coalition's spending plans if it returns to power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工党最近宣布，如果重新执政，它将保留大部分联合政府的开支计划。

sense_info_list.en: keep someone engaged in one's service

examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的工程师被留用了。

精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: A novel type of steel resists fractures at much lower temperatures, while <highlight>retaining</highlight> its strength and toughness—without the need for expensive additives.

examination_example.sentence: The scientists are breeding successive generations to arrive at varieties that incorporate salt tolerance but <highlight>retain</highlight> about 97 percent of the European rice genome (基因组).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家正通过连续培育以期得出既包含耐盐基因，同时又保留97%左右的欧洲水稻基因的品种。

examination_example.sentence: Their babies <highlight>retain</highlight> the ability to produce their own chlorophyll, though they can't generate energy from sunlight until they've eaten enough algae to steal the necessary genes, which they can't yet produce on their own.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们的后代延续了这种可以自己制造叶绿素的能力，尽管直到它们吃掉足够多的藻类以获取这种必要的基因(它们还无法自己制造这种基因)，它们才能够从阳光中制造能量。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 较正式，强调继续保持，保证不失去。
强调对某一状态的保持，常用作保养、维护等。
较口语化，也较常用，指长时间保持。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
